text: Domenic J. Sarno (born May 4, 1963) is the current mayor of Springfield, Massachusetts. First elected in 2007, Sarno has won re-election five times since and is a member of the Democratic Party. He is the longest-serving mayor in Springfield. title: Domenic Sarno
